title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.6 - Information concerning the right to a hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.6 - Information concerning the right to a hearing

State Regulations

Every person has the right to receive certain information
in writing when the department issues a final determination. Each person
sanctioned, or from whom the department requests payment, has the right to a
notice which advises him/her: (a) of
the hearing right; (b) how to
obtain a hearing; (c) of the right
to be represented at the hearing, or to represent himself/herself; and
(d) of the types of information
which may be submitted at the hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
519.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
